parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the mechatronic unit can cause the transmission to malfunction, leading to sudden and unexpected movements, loss of power, and difficulty shifting gears, which can increase the risk of accidents and leave the driver stranded.
symptoms: The transmission jerks or lunges forward when coming to a stop
the car shifts into neutral without warning
the car loses power
the transmission slips or hesitates
the gearbox warning light appears on the dashboard.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The transmission slipping or hesitation can cause the vehicle to lose power, making it difficult to control, which can increase the risk of accidents.
symptoms: The transmission slips or hesitates
the car loses power
the transmission jerks or lunges forward when coming to a stop
the gearbox warning light appears on the dashboard.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The engagement of limp mode can cause the vehicle to lose power, making it difficult to control, which can increase the risk of accidents.
symptoms: The vehicle goes into limp mode
the transmission shifts into neutral without warning
the car loses power
the gearbox warning light appears on the dashboard.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Delayed or Unavailable Takata Airbag Recall Repairs
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The delay or unavailability of Takata airbag recall repairs can increase the risk of death or serious injury to drivers and passengers, as the faulty airbag inflators can rupture and cause harm.
symptoms: Notification of recall
but parts are unavailable
delayed or excessive wait time for repair
verbal advice to continue driving despite warning of potential danger
conflicting information from manufacturer and dealerships.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The separation of the rear convertible window from the roof can cause water leaks, excessive road noise, and potentially lead to the window falling out or flying off while driving, posing a safety risk to the occupants and other road users.
symptoms: The rear convertible window is separating from the roof
water leaks into the car
excessive road noise
the window is only attached by corners
the window is about to fall out of the frame.
